name: Intersex Family and Support Network
description: The Intersex and Family Support Network serves the families of intersex people, parents and babies, children, teenagers, and particularly intersex adults.

name: National Network of Abortion Funds
description: The National Network of Abortion Funds builds power with members to remove financial and logistical barriers to abortion access by centering people who have abortions and organizing at the intersections of racial, economic, and reproductive justice.

name: TransWave Jamica
description: TransWave is a non-governmental organization working to advance the health, welfare, and well-being of the transgender community in Jamaica and the Caribbean.

name: iCon UK
description: iCon UK represents the interests of people born with intersex traits/variations of sex characteristics (VSC) / diverse or differences in sex development (DSD), hereafter intersex* people and their communities.

name: Intersex Nigeria
description: The mission of Intersex-Nigeria is to create awareness about intersex through public education and social engagements, build a community space for intersex persons to co-habit, provide psychological and well-being support for intersex persons in Nigeria, and advocate for intersex rights in Nigeria.

name: DeGenderation Confederation
description: DeGenderation Confederation (DGC) is a non-profit organization working with the goal of abolishing the gender norm system towards sustainable and inclusive equality in society.

name: Círculo Violeta
description: Circulo Violeta emerges from the need to connect with other intersex, trans and non-binary artists.

name: LEZ Connect
description: LEZ Connect’s mission is to provide an environment for LBTQ women where they can feel safe and focus on their rights to put an end to violence against women.

name: Guyana RainBow Foundation
description: Guyana RainBow Foundation (GuyBow) is an organization founded in 2000 whose mission is to support and strengthen the capacity of Lesbian, Bisexual, and Queer women.

name: Intersex Asia Network
description: Intersex Asia works for/with intersex activists, organizations, and communities in Asia.
